title: League of Legend Client.exe
body: Appears every time i try to start the client, and i dont know how to fix it, it appears ,,LeagueClient.exe - Ordinal Not Found: The ordinal 4684 could not be located in the dynamic link libary LIBEAY32.dll. ,, Have you a solution for it

replies.body: Hey thanks for the screenshot!  You have an antivirus or firewall program as a likely culprit here, that's preventing league's .dll files from being used.  You'll want to reconfigure your software to allow the entire League of Legends folder access.  Once completed, follow our [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) guide to fix this all up.
